text.section: In this section, "employer" includes a governmental unit.

Except as provided in § 3-414 of this subtitle, each employer shall pay:
to each employee who is subject to both the federal Act and this subtitle, at least the greater of:
the minimum wage for that employee under the federal Act; or
a wage that equals a rate of $6.15 per hour; and
each other employee who is subject to this subtitle, at least:
the greater of:
the highest minimum wage under the federal Act; or
a wage that equals a rate of $6.15 per hour; or
a training wage under regulations that the Commissioner adopts that include the conditions and limitations authorized under the federal Fair Labor Standards Amendments of 1989.
